hr.p: Please click here to read the statement regarding COVID 19 from Superintendent Will Heath posted March 13, 2020.

Last night Governor Whitmer issued Executive Order 2020-16 regarding child care services for members of Michigan's essential workforce. ISD's were asked to provide support by coordinating the finding of child care services for Michigan's essential workforce (as defined in EO 2020-16). Ionia County ISD will assist in supporting our essential workforce in securing private or already existing child care options in our local communities.
